name: VNC Configuration File
summary: Learn about .VNC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: VNC settings files may include information such as the server address, data compression level, and encoding or encryption settings.
NOTE: UltraVNC automatically saves Last Viewer settings in a file named "latest.vnc." The file is typically stored in the user's "Local Settings" folder.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
